actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish a satellite outpatient clinic in northeast Wisconsin.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish and maintain a satellite outpatient clinic in northeast Wisconsin. Directs the Secretary to seek to locate such clinic at an existing medical facility that is vacant or underutilized if such facility meets the requirements of the Department of Veterans Affairs. Directs the Secretary to begin providing medical services at such clinic no later than October 1, 1991.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish a satellite outpatient clinic in northeast Wisconsin.
